casebody.data:
Joseph COHEN
v.
Robert MEYERS et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 29, 2017

Richard D. Carella and Christopher A. Klepps, in support of the petition.

Melissa S. Harris and Michael F. Dowley, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 175 Conn. App. 519, 167 A.3d 1157 (2017), is denied.
